DOC.brief_summary: The aim study four experimental session . The aim : - characterize excitability cortical pharyngeal area pharyngeal pressure electromyogram ( EMGs ) , rest , awake healthy subject ; - study facilitation inspiration deglutition ; - study plasticity respiration swallowing .
DOC.brief_title: Cortical Pharyngeal Area : Excitability , Facilitation Plasticity Healthy Subjects
